Movie & Dining: 2 Free Movie Tickets Each Month. Upto ₹6,000 Discount on Dining Each Year With EazyDiner
Rewards Rate: 3 RPs for All Eligible Spends and 0.7 RPs on Select Categories (Utilities, Education, Government Transactions)
Reward Redemption: Redeem Points at Indus Moments. You Can Redeem at a 1:1 Ratio for Cash Credit, Airmiles, and Gift Vouchers
International Lounge Access: Unlimited International Airport Lounge Access (Through Priority Pass)
Golf: Unlimited Domestic Golf Lessons and Games
Insurance Benefits: Overseas Medical Insurance of USD 25,000, Air Accident Cover and Total Protect

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹10 Lakh or More in a Year
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waived on Transactions Between ₹500 and ₹10,000

product_details: The IndusInd Pioneer Private Credit Card is one of the most luxurious offerings by the bank.
One can avail of Buy One Get One Free on movie and non-movie ticket bookings.
One of the exclusive features of this card is the unlimited complimentary domestic and international airport lounge access.
Cardholders shall also be eligible for unlimited golf lessons across India.
